WorkItem.ClosedComment: User needs to mark those gems available
WorkItem.Description: I loaded my priest from the armory, selected 2 items to see if those two items is worth upgrading. When I tried to Optimize though, the new pop-up message that warns of no gems/enchants selected for certain items was giving me this message even though all three items are gemmed/enchanted from the armory. The only thing the three items had in common was that all three had a JC gem in each one.
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] new warning having issues with JC gems

Comments.Message: Doesn't matter if they're gemmed/enchanted from the armory. Those gems still need to be available to be used by the optimizer, unless it's part of a specifically available gemming (blue diamond), which it isn't by default from Armory.
